steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'File' tab in the top left corner of the window.
In the Word Options dialog box, click on the 'Customize Ribbon' tab.
On the right side of the dialog box, under 'Customize the Ribbon', you will see a list of available tabs and groups.
To add a new tab, click on the 'New Tab' button.
To add a new group within a tab, select the tab from the list and click on the 'New Group' button.
To add a command to a group, select the group and click on the 'New Command' button.
In the 'Choose commands from' dropdown menu, select the category of commands you want to add.
Select the command you want to add and click on the 'Add' button.
To remove a command, select it from the list on the right side and click on the 'Remove' button.
To rearrange the order of tabs, groups, or commands, use the 'Up' and 'Down' buttons.
Click on the 'OK' button to save your changes and close the Word Options dialog box.
